title: Buttons
description: In a button puzzle, players must press buttons in the correct order in order to win
creator: sam.baynham@gmail.com

configOptions.label: Clue
configOptions.helpText: A clue that will be presented to the player.

configOptions.label: Failure
configOptions.helpText: The die that will be rolled for damage if the players get the solution wrong.

configOptions.label: Buttons
configOptions.helpText: An list of button names which will be used to generate buttons on the screen. Comma separated list.

configOptions.label: Solution
configOptions.helpText: An array of the switch names above containing only valid selections in the order they should be pressed. The names of the valid options must match the names of buttons defined in the buttons field.
